level.heading: DEPARTMENT PROCESS FOR CERTIFIED BUSINESS ENTERPRISE STATUS (§ 27-806)

level.text: 806.1 Upon receipt of an application for certification as a CBE, the Directorhall conduct a preliminary review of the submission for compliance with theequirements of the Act and this chapter and take one of the following actions:
If the application is complete, it shall be accepted for review by theepartment; or

If the application is incomplete or lacks the required verification, ithall be returned to the applicant with a notice indicating the need fordditional actions or materials in order for the application to be accepted foreview.

806.3 Upon completion of the Department’s review, the Director shalletermine the eligibility of the applicant and advise the applicant in writingf the determination regarding its application.
